p: Furthermore, we analyzed the linear regression equations to study the association of these antioxidant components with the results found in antioxidant assay and the values of correlation coefficient (R) are given in Table 3. Nine R values ranging from 0.789 to 0.994 were observed when the IC 50 values from the three radical scavenging assays were plotted against TPC, TFC and TTC. These high values of R suggest that the antioxidant activities of the three date cultivars might be a result of their phenolic, flavonoid and tannin content since these phytoconstituents are the main antioxidant principles found in natural sources.
